author: Staff Reporter
text:
Speakers at the golden jubilee celebrations of Chengalpattu Medical College Hospital urged the State government to upgrade it to a multi-speciality hospital.

The hospital, located at a strategic point on Grand Southern Trunk road between Chennai and Tindivanam, received several accident and trauma cases. Upgrading the hospital will help patients, they said. Health Minister C. Vijaya Baskar released a souvenir. Animal Husbandry Minister T.K.M. Chinnaiah and Collector R. Gajalakshmi took part.
title: ‘Upgrade medical college hospital’
